items.summary: Create a single-page Valentine-themed landing experience with a soft, dreamy, Disney-fairytale-inspired (but clean/elegant) visual style using blush pink/soft red/peach gradients, warm glow highlights, subtle white accents, rounded elegant typography, and an animated background (soft animated gradient and/or subtle floating light particles). Ensure the styling is consistent across all screens and responsive without harsh colors, dark theme, or heavy fonts.

Ensure production-ready responsiveness and quality: no unwanted scrollbars (unless absolutely necessary), buttons remain visible, the No button logic remains safe within viewport constraints, proper z-index layering for popups/modal/decorations, and no console errors. Avoid duplicate event listeners, infinite loops, unused variables, and memory leaks. Include clear code organization and commented sections for major UI states/animations.

Implement the landing screen with the centered heading text exactly: ‚ÄúFili, will you be my Valentine? üíñ‚Äù and two rounded romantic buttons labeled exactly: ‚ÄúYes üíï‚Äù and ‚ÄúNo üò¢‚Äù. Add soft glow, smooth hover animation, rounded corners, and slight scale effect on hover for both buttons.

Implement strict ‚ÄúNo üò¢‚Äù button behavior: it starts visible and on every click moves to a random position while ALWAYS remaining fully inside the viewport and ALWAYS clickable (never partially off-screen, never unreachable) across desktop/mobile/tablet. Compute the random position using the provided formula with button dimensions and a configurable margin: maxX = window.innerWidth - buttonWidth - margin; maxY = window.innerHeight - buttonHeight - margin; random X/Y in [0,maxX] and [0,maxY]. Update positioning correctly on viewport resize/orientation changes to prevent overflow bugs.

Show exactly 7 sequential popup messages triggered by No button clicks. Each popup must appear top-center, with rounded corners, soft pink background, soft shadow, and auto-dismiss after 1.5 seconds. Popups must not stack permanently. Use this exact sequence (one per click): 1) ‚ÄúAre you sure? ü•∫‚Äù 2) ‚ÄúReally sure? üíî‚Äù 3) ‚ÄúPlease don‚Äôt say no üò¢‚Äù 4) ‚ÄúI‚Äôll bring chocolates üç´‚Äù 5) ‚ÄúI‚Äôll send teddy hugs üß∏‚Äù 6) ‚ÄúCats and butterflies for you üê±ü¶ã‚Äù 7) ‚ÄúOkay fine‚Ä¶ last chance üíñ‚Äù.

After the 7th No click: stop moving the No button. Implement ‚ÄúYes üíï‚Äù button gating: it must be initially hidden or visually small, and only become fully visible after the 7th No click with a smooth fade-in animation and slight glow effect.

On ‚ÄúYes üíï‚Äù click, start playing a local audio file named forever.mp3. Audio must NOT autoplay on page load and must ONLY start after the Yes click user gesture. Set volume to a moderate level (not maximum). If play() fails due to autoplay policy or other errors, handle the error silently (no user-visible error state; no console noise). Music should continue playing in the background after starting.

On ‚ÄúYes üíï‚Äù click, automatically open a centered romantic photo modal using the uploaded image file IMG_20221213_093702.jpg. The modal must have rounded corners, soft shadow, a slight scale-in animation, a soft blurred backdrop, smooth transitions, and be mobile-safe. The image must scale proportionally (no stretching), never overflow the viewport, and remain fully viewable on small screens.

On ‚ÄúYes üíï‚Äù click, display the following apology message text exactly (including punctuation and emoji), styled beautifully with soft romantic typography, centered layout, high readability, and a smooth fade-in:

Fili‚Ä¶

I‚Äôm truly sorry.
Sorry for being rude, for raising my voice, for the harsh words I used.
I‚Äôm sorry for every single thing that hurt you.
I‚Äôm honestly ashamed of my behavior, and you didn‚Äôt deserve any of it.

But please believe me when I say this ‚Äî
the time I spent with you has been one of the most beautiful chapters of my life.
Every moment with you meant more to me than I could ever express.

You are, without a doubt, one of the most beautiful girls in this world ‚Äî
not just by looks, but by heart, by soul,
by the way you make everything brighter. ‚ú®

Please don‚Äôt ever blame yourself.
None of this was your fault.
If there was a mistake, it was mine.

With love,
Akash ü§ç

After ‚ÄúYes üíï‚Äù click, trigger decorative celebration effects: floating üíñ hearts, ü¶ã butterflies, üê± cats, üç´ chocolates, üß∏ teddy bears, ‚ú® sparkles, and üåπ roses. Decorations must spawn gradually (not all at once), float upward, fade out smoothly, and be removed from the DOM after the animation to avoid memory leaks and performance degradation.
